category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_search_indexer_query_hint
preference.preference_description: Specifies the best SQL execution plan needed for TcFtsIndexer query based on start and end date. This is to avoid long running SQLs for query calls since the DB chooses the wrong hint in some cases. When indexing the entire DB, watch the process through DBA tool, if there is any performance problem, follow below steps to figure out the best execution plan, set the preference value appropriately for next run. * Analyze SQL generated by TcFTSIndexer, get the optimized SQL from DBA tool * Consult with DBA to set what hint is best for the SQL
